data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
This is a sub-module to PDF::Reuse. It creates barcode "images" to
    be used in PDF documents. It uses GD::Barcode and its sub-modules:
    GD::Barcode::Code39, COOP2of5, EAN13 and so on to calculate the
    barcode pattern. Normally the barcodes are displayed on a white
    background and with the characters under the bars. You can rotate
    the "image", make it smaller or bigger, prolong the bars and change
    the background.
